title: How to write a poem of appreciation - Quora

response.answer_text: In some type of poems, appreciations are made intensified such as in the Sonnets and romantic poetry…. If a poet unwillingly wants to show his admiration only to gain popularity, the poem will not be so attractive. Because admiration or devotion comes to heart from love. In order to write a poem on appreciation, that poet have to love that person or thing.Such words are to be added which are uncommon and are used in poem. The poet have to describe that objects’ attractive sights in his point of view.

To write such poem you needs to appreciate the appreciation from core of the heart. First think on what and how you want to appreciate ?. How it will made the concern person bless and special. Now collect appropriate words. Then write down one feeling after another feeling. Of course with the feelings of appreciation. Aditya Mehta thanks for A2A. Qa :- How do I write a poem of appreciation?
